pull.title: Assert that CWallet::SyncMetaData finds oldest transaction.
pull.body: Without this assert, the Clang static analyzer warns about subsequent dereferencing of copyFrom, because it can't be sure that it's not nullptr. See #9573.

events.message:
Assert that CWallet::SyncMetaData finds oldest transaction.

This fixes one of the Clang static analyzer warnings mentioned in #9573.

comments.body: That would not suffice to silence the analyzer, because copyFrom is also nullptr if the range is nonempty but n == nMinOrderPos in every iteration.
